>>Pseudo-random number generator:<<
[ ] Produces numbers that are random. [x] Produces numbers deterministically. [x] Produces numbers that look random. [ ] Produces sequences of numbers that cannot generally be repeated. [x] Are used extensively in manufacturing systems simulation and the simulation of other complex systems.
[explanation] A pseudo-random number generator is determined the seed of the random number generator and output numbers that fulfill a set of requirements to look random. The use of this generator enables the analysis of systems whose processes are inherently stochastic without performing physical experiments. [explanation]
